original_text: The other servant went down on his knees in front of the first servant. He said, “Please, please give me some more time, then I will give you the money.”
korean_text: 그 동료가 엎드려 간구하여 이르되 나에게 참아 주소서 갚으리이다 하되

sentences.original_text: The other servant went down on his knees
in front of the first servant
Please, please give me some more time
then I will give you the money
